attributes.action: Change the Legal Driving Age (only for Provisional License) to 16 years old.
attributes.background: The US already has this in function, including another few nations. Considering the UK being a rising progressive country I think the Parliament should enforce this because it would help 16 year olds who have jobs (and/or need to commute) get from A to B faster.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for the same action:

Change the age to get a full car drivers licence to 16 years
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643332

Lower The Legal Driving Age To 16
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/640201
